questions.question: Where are the markets
questions.answer: B1, E3, C1, D6 (More to come)

questions.question: ccc
questions.answer:
The ccc console command adds your current coordinates in Atlas to your clipboard, here's how to use it:
1: Open the console with the Tilde/Tick key - the button below [Esc]
	a.*(For other keyboard layouts you might need to assign a different key, check your keybinding in options for 'toggle console')*
2: Exit the menu and open the console with the assigned key
3: Type ccc and hit enter. Coordinates will be saved into your clipboard.
4: Then tab out to discord and paste (ctrl + v) into support.
